mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM quest WHERE trainee_id=#{traineeId} AND DATE(start_at)=DATE(#{startAt})

SELECT q.quest_id, q.trainee_id, q.trainer_id, q.start_at, q.end_at, q.created_at, q.updated_at, r.review_id AS review_id, r.difficulty, r.created_at AS review_created_at, f.feedback_id AS feedback_id, f.content AS feedback_content, f.created_at AS feedback_created_at, t.task_id AS task_id, t.order_index, t.is_completed, t.count, t.weight_kg, t.cardio_minutes, t.exercise_id FROM quest q LEFT JOIN review r ON q.quest_id = r.quest_id LEFT JOIN feedback f ON q.quest_id = f.quest_id LEFT JOIN task t ON q.quest_id = t.quest_id WHERE q.trainee_id = #{traineeId} AND DATE(q.start_at) = DATE(#{startAt})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO quest (trainee_id, trainer_id, start_at, end_at) VALUES (#{traineeId}, #{trainerId}, #{startAt}, #{endAt})
mapper.select: SELECT q.trainee_id AS trainee_id, q.quest_id AS quest_id, DATE(q.start_at) AS start_at, CONCAT( ROUND( (SUM(CASE WHEN t.is_completed = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(t.task_id)) * 100, 0 ), '%' ) AS questCompletionRate, r.difficulty AS review, f.content AS feedback FROM quest q LEFT JOIN task t ON q.quest_id = t.quest_id LEFT JOIN review r ON q.quest_id = r.quest_id LEFT JOIN feedback f ON q.quest_id = f.quest_id WHERE q.trainee_id = #{traineeId} AND DATE(q.start_at) BETWEEN DATE(#{startAt}) AND DATE(#{endAt}) GROUP BY q.trainee_id, q.quest_id, r.difficulty, f.content;

SELECT t.id AS trainee_id, q.quest_id AS quest_id, CASE WHEN q.quest_id IS NULL THEN '퀘스트 미등록' WHEN COUNT(ts.task_id) > 0 THEN '퀘스트 수행중' ELSE '퀘스트 완료' END AS quest_status FROM trainee t LEFT JOIN quest q ON t.id = q.trainee_id AND DATE(q.start_at) = DATE(#{startAt}) LEFT JOIN task ts ON q.quest_id = ts.quest_id AND ts.is_completed = FALSE WHERE t.trainer_id = #{trainerId} GROUP BY t.id, q.quest_id;
